pr_title: GEODE-8217: Deserialize attribute before update and remove.

timeline.bodyText: I think the method name does not reflect PreferDeserializedForm. It might be better to be explicit instead of using Deprecated.
timeline.author: pivotal-eshu

timeline.bodyText: Couple of typos here. Should be "Always prefer deserialized form."
timeline.author: DonalEvans

timeline.bodyText: Typo here, should be "setPreferDeserializedForm". Also, tests using this method should probably be renamed, since they state the condition "WhenPreferSerializedFormFalse" rather than "WhenPreferDeserializedFormFalse". It's also a little misleading as a method name, since setPreferDeserializedForm() with no argument would tend to imply setting the value to true rather than false.
timeline.author: DonalEvans

timeline.bodyText: See comment on DeltaSession7Test.java regarding this typo and method names.
timeline.author: DonalEvans

timeline.bodyText: See comment on DeltaSession7Test.java regarding this typo and method names.
timeline.author: DonalEvans

timeline.bodyText: Typo here, should be "Always prefer deserialized form."
timeline.author: DonalEvans

timeline.bodyText: Can this commented code be removed?
timeline.author: DonalEvans

timeline.bodyText: While we're here, it might be worth cleaning up uses of this warning suppression using the uncheckedCast() method, as used elsewhere in this change set. There is one cast in this method (line 651) and one on line 633 of getSizeInBytes().
timeline.author: DonalEvans

timeline.bodyText: Typo here, should be "Always prefer deserialized form."
